Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityKeyMapper
    Use AffinityKeyMapped or CacheKeyConfiguration.setAffinityKeyFieldName(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.DataRegionMetrics
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport
    since 2.0. Please use specialized asynchronous methods.
    org.apache.ignite.MemoryMetrics
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.plugin.extensions.communication.MessageFactory
    Use MessageFactoryProvider instead.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamTupleExtractor
    Will be removed in 2.0.0.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.TransactionMetricsMxBean
    Check the JmxMetricExporterSpi with "name=\"tx\"" instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.AttributeNames
    fix it in the ticket https://ggsystems.atlassian.net/browse/GG-29546
    org.apache.ignite.events.ClusterActivationEvent
    Use ClusterStateChangeEvent instead.
    org.apache.ignite.DataRegionMetricsAdapter
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryConfiguration
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration
    Use DataRegionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.OdbcConfiguration
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConnectorConfiguration
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlQuery
    Since 2.8, please use SqlFieldsQuery instead.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupported
    since 2.0. Please use specialized asynchronous methods.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.MXBeanParametersDescriptions
    Use MXBeanParameter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.MXBeanParametersNames
    Use MXBeanParameter instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.ATTR_SHMEM_PORT
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_ACTIVE_ON_START
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_AUTO_ACTIVATION
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_LATE_AFF_ASSIGNMENT
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_LOCK_TIMEOUT
    Default lock timeout configuration property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT
    Please use SqlConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteDataStreamer.DFLT_MAX_PARALLEL_OPS
    Is not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.DFLT_METRICS_ENABLED
    Will be removed in upcoming releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.DFLT_PESSIMISTIC_TX_LOG_LINGER
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCH_SIZE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCH_SIZE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCHES_PREFETCH_COUNT
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCHES_PREFETCH_COUNT instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THREAD_POOL_SIZE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THREAD_POOL_SIZE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THROTTLE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THROTTLE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_TIMEOUT
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_TIMEOUT instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.DFLT_SHMEM_PORT
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_SQL_QUERY_HISTORY_SIZE
    Please use SqlConfiguration.DFLT_SQL_QUERY_HISTORY_SIZE.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.TcpDiscoveryIpFinderAdapter.ignite
    Since 2.8. May contain an invalid Ignite instance when multiple nodes shares same TcpDiscoveryIpFinder instance.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_BINARY_DONT_WRAP_TREE_STRUCTURES
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_CACHE_KEY_VALIDATION_DISABLED
    Since 2.10 Obsolete because of common use of binary marshaller.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_COMMAND
    Use "--enable-experimental" parameter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_EVICTION_PERMITS
    Since version 2.10. Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceThreadPoolSize(int) to manage eviction parallelism.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_H2_DEBUG_CONSOLE
    Since 2.8. H2 console is no longer supported.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_H2_DEBUG_CONSOLE_PORT
    Since 2.8. H2 console is no longer supported.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_IPC_SHMEM_SPACE_DEBUG
    This property is ignored and will be deleted in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_JOBS_METRICS_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=compute.jobs" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.ssl.SslContextFactory.IGNITE_KEY_ALGORITHM_PROPERTY
    Use "ssl.KeyManagerFactory.algorithm" instead as per JSSE standard. Should be considered for deletion in 9.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_LOG_GRID_NAME
    Use IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_LOG_INSTANCE_NAME.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_MIN_BUFFERED_COMMUNICATION_MSG_CNT
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_PDS_PARTITION_DESTROY_CHECKPOINT_DELAY
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_PDS_WAL_REBALANCE_THRESHOLD
    use Distributed MetaStorage property historical.rebalance.threshold.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REBALANCE_STATISTICS_TIME_INTERVAL
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REBALANCE_THROTTLE_OVERRIDE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceThrottle() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REST_GETALL_AS_ARRAY
    Should be made default in Apache Ignite 3.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_SQL_FORCE_LAZY_RESULT_SET
    Since version 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_THRESHOLD_WAL_ARCHIVE_SIZE_PERCENTAGE
    Use DataStorageConfiguration.setMinWalArchiveSize(long).
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_UNWRAP_BINARY_FOR_INDEXING_SPI
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_WAIT_FOR_BACKUPS_ON_SHUTDOWN
    Use ShutdownPolicy instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_WAL_DEBUG_LOG_ON_RECOVERY
    Not used.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.OUT_OF_RESOURCES_TCP_MSG
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.xgboost.parser.XGBoostModelParser.tokenNames
    Use XGBoostModelParser.VOCABULARY instead.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.xgboost.parser.XGBoostModelLexer.tokenNames
    Use XGBoostModelLexer.VOCABULARY instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.active()
    Use IgniteCluster.state() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.active()
    Use IgniteCluster.state() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.active()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.active" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.active(boolean)
    Use IgniteCluster.state(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.active(boolean)
    Use IgniteCluster.state(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.active(boolean)
    Use IgniteMXBean.clusterState(String, boolean) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiContext.addMessageListener(GridMessageListener, String)
    Use IgniteSpiContext.addLocalMessageListener(Object, IgniteBiPredicate) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.services.Service.cancel(ServiceContext)
    Use Service.cancel() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.SnapshotMXBean.cancelSnapshot(String)
    Use SnapshotMXBean.cancelSnapshotOperation(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.SnapshotMXBean.cancelSnapshotRestore(String)
    Use SnapshotMXBean.cancelSnapshotOperation(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.clusterState()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.clusterState" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.clusterState(String)
    Use IgniteMXBean.clusterState(String, boolean) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.dataRegionMetrics()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.TcpDiscoveryIpFinderAdapter.discoveryClientMode()
    Since 2.8. May return incorrect value if client and server nodes shares same TcpDiscoveryIpFinder instance.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.estimateRebalancingFinishTime()
    org.apache.ignite.services.Service.execute(ServiceContext)
    Use Service.execute() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.client.ClientCompute.executeAsync(String, T)
    Use ClientCompute.executeAsync2(String, Object) instead. This method calls ClientCompute.executeAsync2(String, Object) internally, but returns a more limited Future interface.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCompute.future()
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.future()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getCheckpointSpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.checkpointSpiFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getCollisionSpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.collisionSpiFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getCommunicationSpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.communicationSpiFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.DiscoverySpiMBean.getCoordinator()
    Use DiscoverySpiMBean.getCoordinatorNodeFormatted() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getCopyright()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.copyright" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getCurrentCoordinatorFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.currentCoordinatorFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getDefaultLockTimeout()
    Default lock timeout configuration property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getDefaultQueryTimeout()
    Use SqlConfiguration.getDefaultQueryTimeout() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConfiguration.getDefaultQueryTimeout()
    Since 2.9. Please use distributed default query timeout.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getDeploymentSpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.deploymentSpiFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getDhtEvictQueueCurrentSize()
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getDiscoverySpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.discoverySpiFormatted" instead.

    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getEventStorageSpiFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.eventStorageSpiFormatted" instead.

    Use CacheConfiguration.getEvictionPolicyFactory() instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.fullVersion" instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.gridLoggerFormatted" instead.

    Use IgniteConfiguration.getIgniteInstanceName() instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.igniteHome" instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.InstanceName" instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.jdkInformation" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getKeySize()
    Can overflow. Use CacheMetrics.getCacheSize() instead.

    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.lifecycleBeansFormatted" instead.

    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getLongJVMPausesTotalDuration()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.longJVMPausesTotalDuration" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout()
    Use SqlConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getMarshaller()
    Since 2.1. Some Ignite features will not work if non-null marshaller is set (IgniteCache.withKeepBinary(), .NET, CPP, ODBC)
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getMBeanServerFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.mBeanServerFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getMemoryConfiguration()
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.

    Use CacheConfiguration.getDataRegionName() (String)} instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClientConnectorConfiguration() ()} instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CollectionConfiguration.getOffHeapMaxMemory()
    No longer used.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getOsInformation()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.osInformation" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getOsUser()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.osUser" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getPersistentStoreConfiguration()
    Part of old API. Use DataStorageConfiguration for configuring persistence instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getPessimisticTxLogLinger()
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getPessimisticTxLogSize()
    Pessimistic tx log size property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getPluginConfigurations()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.getRateTimeInterval()
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration.getRateTimeInterval()
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceBatchesPrefetchCount()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceBatchesPrefetchCount() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceBatchSize()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceBatchSize() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceDelay()
    Use baseline topology feature instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceThreadPoolSize()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceThrottle()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceThrottle() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceTimeout()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceTimeout() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpiMBean.getSharedMemoryPort()
    This property will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getSize()
    Can overflow. Use CacheMetrics.getCacheSize() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getSqlConnectorConfiguration()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClientConnectorConfiguration() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getSqlQueryHistorySize()
    Use SqlConfiguration.setSqlQueryHistorySize(int) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getSqlSchemas()
    Use SqlConfiguration.getSqlSchemas() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ConnectorConfiguration.getSslContextFactory()
    Use ConnectorConfiguration.getSslFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getStartTimestamp()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.startTimestamp" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getStartTimestampFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.startTimestampFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.getSubIntervals()
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration.getSubIntervals()
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.getSystemRegionInitialSize()
    use SystemDataRegionConfiguration.getInitialSize().
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.getSystemRegionMaxSize()
    use SystemDataRegionConfiguration.getMaxSize().
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.getTlbSize()
    Instead PersistentStoreConfiguration.getWalBufferSize() should be used.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.xgboost.parser.XGBoostModelParser.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.ignite.ml.xgboost.parser.XGBoostModelLexer.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getTransactionManagerLookupClassName()
    Use TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter.getTupleExtractor()
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxCommitQueueSize()
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxDhtCommitQueueSize()
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxDhtPrepareQueueSize()
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxDhtStartVersionCountsSize()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerLookupClassName()
    Use TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxPrepareQueueSize()
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.getTxStartVersionCountsSize()
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getUpTime()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.upTime" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getUpTimeFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.uptimeFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getUserAttributesFormatted()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.userAttributesFormatted" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.getVmName()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.VmName" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.getWalBufferSize()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.getWalHistorySize()
    Instead of walHistorySize use maxWalArchiveSize for manage of archive size.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.kubernetes.TcpDiscoveryKubernetesIpFinder.includeNotReadyAddresses(boolean)
    set parameters with KubernetesConnectionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.services.Service.init(ServiceContext)
    Use Service.init() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isActiveOnStart()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClusterStateOnStart() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.isAsync()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isAutoActivationEnabled()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClusterStateOnStart() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.TcpDiscoverySpi.isForceServerMode()
    Will be removed at 3.0.
    org.apache.ignite.platform.dotnet.PlatformDotNetBinaryTypeConfiguration.isKeepDeserialized()
    Use PlatformDotNetBinaryTypeConfiguration.getKeepDeserialized() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isLateAffinityAssignment()
    Starting from Ignite 2.1 late affinity assignment is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlFieldsQuery.isLazy()
    Use Query.getPageSize() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.isMetricsEnabled()
    Will be removed in upcoming releases.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.isNodeInBaseline()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.isNodeInBaseline" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.isPeerClassLoadingEnabled()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.isPeerClassLoadingEnabled" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isPersistentStoreEnabled()
    Part of legacy configuration API. Doesn't work if new configuration API is used.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.isRebalanceEnabled()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.isRebalanceEnabled" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlQuery.isReplicatedOnly()
    No longer used as of Apache Ignite 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlFieldsQuery.isReplicatedOnly()
    No longer used as of Apache Ignite 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.isTxSerializableEnabled()
    org.apache.ignite.spi.systemview.view.ComputeTaskView.jobId()
    Use ComputeTaskView.id() or ComputeTaskView.sessionId() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteMXBean.lastClusterStateChangeTime()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=ignite.lastClusterStateChangeTime" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.lockAll(Collection<? extends K>)
    It is recommended to use Ignite.reentrantLock(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) instead. This method will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.memoryMetrics()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.memoryMetrics(String)
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.rebalance()
    Use baseline topology feature instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheMetrics.rebalancingStartTime()
    org.apache.ignite.marshaller.MarshallerContext.registerClassName(byte, int, String)
    Use MarshallerContext.registerClassName(byte, int, java.lang.String, boolean) instead. This particular method will be deleted in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiContext.removeMessageListener(GridMessageListener, String)
    Use IgniteSpiContext.removeLocalMessageListener(Object, IgniteBiPredicate) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ThinClientConfiguration.sendServerExceptionStackTraceToClient(boolean)
    Use ThinClientConfiguration.setServerToClientExceptionStackTraceSending(boolean) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.service(String)
    Use the proxies like IgniteServices.serviceProxy(String, Class, boolean). References to local services corrupt the service statistics and bring no real performance optimization.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.services(String)
    Use the proxies like IgniteServices.serviceProxy(String, Class, boolean). References to local services corrupt the service statistics and bring no real performance optimization.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.CacheStore.sessionEnd(boolean)
    Use CacheStoreSessionListener instead (refer to its JavaDoc for details).
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.kubernetes.TcpDiscoveryKubernetesIpFinder.setAccountToken(String)
    set parameters with KubernetesConnectionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setActiveOnStart(boolean)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClusterStateOnStart(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setAutoActivationEnabled(boolean)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClusterStateOnStart(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.rendezvous.RendezvousAffinityFunction.setBackupFilter(IgniteBiPredicate<ClusterNode, ClusterNode>)
    Use affinityBackupFilter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.CacheJdbcPojoStoreFactory.setDataSource(DataSource)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setDefaultLockTimeout(long)
    Default lock timeout configuration property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout(long)
    Use SqlConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout(long)
    Since 2.9. Please use distributed default query timeout.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setDiscoveryStartupDelay(long)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setEvictionPolicy(EvictionPolicy)
    Use CacheConfiguration.setEvictionPolicyFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.TcpDiscoverySpi.setForceServerMode(boolean)
    Will be removed at 3.0.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setGridName(String)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setIgniteInstanceName(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setLateAffinityAssignment(boolean)
    Starting from Ignite 2.1 late affinity assignment is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlFieldsQuery.setLazy(boolean)
    Use SqlFieldsQuery.setPageSize(int) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.setListener(CommunicationListener<Message>)
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.DiscoverySpi.setListener(DiscoverySpiListener)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout(long)
    Use SqlConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout(long)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setMarshaller(Marshaller)
    Since 2.1. Some Ignite features will not work if non-null marshaller is set (IgniteCache.withKeepBinary(), .NET, CPP, ODBC)
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.kubernetes.TcpDiscoveryKubernetesIpFinder.setMasterUrl(String)
    set parameters with KubernetesConnectionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setMemoryConfiguration(MemoryConfiguration)
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setMemoryPolicyName(String)
    Use CacheConfiguration.setDataRegionName(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsEnabled(boolean)
    Will be removed in upcoming releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataRegionConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataRegionConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.kubernetes.TcpDiscoveryKubernetesIpFinder.setNamespace(String)
    set parameters with KubernetesConnectionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.NearCacheConfiguration.setNearEvictionPolicy(EvictionPolicy<K, V>)
    Use NearCacheConfiguration.setNearEvictionPolicyFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setNodeId(UUID)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setOdbcConfiguration(OdbcConfiguration)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClientConnectorConfiguration(ClientConnectorConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CollectionConfiguration.setOffHeapMaxMemory(long)
    No longer used.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setPersistentStoreConfiguration(PersistentStoreConfiguration)
    Part of old API. Use DataStorageConfiguration for configuring persistence instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setPessimisticTxLogLinger(int)
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setPessimisticTxLogSize(int)
    Pessimistic tx log size property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setPluginConfigurations(PluginConfiguration...)
    Since PluginProviders can be set explicitly via IgniteConfiguration.setPluginProviders(PluginProvider[]) it's preferable to store PluginConfiguration as a part of PluginProvider.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setRateTimeInterval(long)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration.setRateTimeInterval(long)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceBatchesPrefetchCount(long)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceBatchesPrefetchCount(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceBatchSize(int)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceBatchSize(int) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceDelay(long)
    Use baseline topology feature instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceThreadPoolSize(int)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceThrottle(long)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceThrottle(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceTimeout(long)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.ContinuousQuery.setRemoteFilter(CacheEntryEventSerializableFilter<K, V>)
    Use AbstractContinuousQuery.setRemoteFilterFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlQuery.setReplicatedOnly(boolean)
    No longer used as of Apache Ignite 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlFieldsQuery.setReplicatedOnly(boolean)
    No longer used as of Apache Ignite 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.kubernetes.TcpDiscoveryKubernetesIpFinder.setServiceName(String)
    set parameters with KubernetesConnectionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setSqlConnectorConfiguration(SqlConnectorConfiguration)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClientConnectorConfiguration(ClientConnectorConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setSqlQueryHistorySize(int)
    Use SqlConfiguration.getSqlQueryHistorySize() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setSqlSchemas(String...)
    Use SqlConfiguration.setSqlSchemas(String...) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ConnectorConfiguration.setSslContextFactory(GridSslContextFactory)
    Use ConnectorConfiguration.setSslFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setSubIntervals(int)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration.setSubIntervals(int)
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setSystemRegionInitialSize(long)
    use SystemDataRegionConfiguration.setInitialSize(long).
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setSystemRegionMaxSize(long)
    use SystemDataRegionConfiguration.setMaxSize(long).
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setTlbSize(int)
    Instead PersistentStoreConfiguration.setWalBufferSize(int walBuffSize) should be used.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setTransactionManagerLookupClassName(String)
    Use TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter.setTupleExtractor(StreamTupleExtractor<T, K, V>)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerLookupClassName(String)
    Use TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxSerializableEnabled(boolean)
    This method has no effect, TransactionIsolation.SERIALIZABLE isolation is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setWalBufferSize(int)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.setWalHistorySize(int)
    Instead of walHistorySize use maxWalArchiveSize for manage of archive size.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.simulateNodeFailure()
    you should you DI and get instances of [nioSrvWrapper, commWorker, clientPool] via it.
    org.apache.ignite.plugin.PluginProvider.validateNewNode(ClusterNode)
    Use PluginProvider.validateNewNode(ClusterNode, Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCompute.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteEvents.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteMessaging.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.withAsync()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.WALMode.DEFAULT
    This mode is no longer default and left here only for API compatibility. It is equivalent to the FSYNC mode.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.PartitionLossPolicy.READ_ONLY_ALL
    PartitionLossPolicy.READ_ONLY_SAFE is used instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.PartitionLossPolicy.READ_WRITE_ALL
    PartitionLossPolicy.READ_WRITE_SAFE is used instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheAtomicityMode.TRANSACTIONAL_SNAPSHOT
    Use CacheAtomicityMode.TRANSACTIONAL or CacheAtomicityMode.ATOMIC instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
